MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH30 postcode area of Bathgate, affecting properties in Long Crook and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.04pm. Our emergency response team are in the local area carrying out investigations into the flickering lights issue. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:57PM on Thursday 11 February 2021.
